name: Armor All Podium Series Hybrid Ceramic High Gloss Tire Shine Spray, 16 fl oz, Long-Lasting Car Tire Shine Developed in Collaboration With Oracle Red Bull Racing
short_description: DEVELOPED WITH ORACLE RED BULL RACING: One 16 fl oz bottle of Armor All Podium Series Hybrid Ceramic High Gloss Tire Shine Spray, a hybrid ceramic tire shine spray developed to meet the elite performance standards of the Oracle Red Bull Racing team
LONG-LASTING PROTECTIVE BARRIER: SiO2-based ceramic technology leaves a long-lasting protective barrier
HIGH GLOSS SHINE: Synthetic polymers transform tires with an intense and durable high gloss shine
SELF-LEVELS WITHOUT DRIPPING: Clings to tires without dripping and self-levels to a smooth, even finish
LASTS UP TO 4 WEEKS*: High gloss car tire shine is durable enough to last up to 4 weeks* and can withstand several car washes and rain exposure
PRECISE, EVEN APPLICATION: Precision spray trigger delivers optimized application, ensuring the tire shine is evenly applied and dries to a high-shine finish that lasts
THE PERFECT LAST STEP IN YOUR WHEEL AND TIRE REGIMEN: This high gloss tire spray leaves tires protected and shining, with a warm, bold, and invigorating woody scent
product_description: Developed in collaboration with Oracle Red Bull Racing, the Armor All Podium Series Hybrid Ceramic High Gloss Tire Shine Spray combines an SiO2-based protective barrier with synthetic polymers that transform tires with an intense and durable high gloss shine. This hybrid ceramic tire shine formula clings to tires without dripping and self-levels to a smooth, even finish. The high gloss tire shine is durable enough to last up to 4 weeks* and can withstand several car washes and rain exposure. The precision spray trigger delivers optimized application, ensuring the tire shine is evenly applied and dries to a high-shine finish that lasts. The perfect last step in your wheel and tire regimen, this high gloss tire shine spray leaves tires protected and shining. The difference is hybrid ceramic technology, which combines SiO2-based protection with synthetic elements that optimize performance, versatility and ease across cleaning and detailing tasks. This approach provides long-lasting surface protection and podium-worthy results, whether driving to the track or on your daily commute. The Podium Series features a full suite of car cleaning supplies, including Interior Detailer, Exterior Detailer, Wash & Shine, Tire Shine, and Protectant. (*Under regular highway conditions)

name: Chemical Guys Tire Kicker Sprayable Extra Glossy Tire Shine Spray, Dry-to-Touch Dressing - Restores Wet Look to Rubber, Vinyl, and Plastic, Safe for Cars, Trucks, Motorcycles, RVs, and More - 16 oz
short_description: TIRE KICKER TIRE SHINE (TVD1131602) – Sprayable tire dressing restores a deep, wet look to rubber, vinyl, and plastic surfaces while helping to protect against fading, cracking, and discoloration from the elements
EXTRA GLOSSY FINISH – Leaves behind a rich, showroom shine on tires, trim, bumpers, and weatherstripping for a freshly detailed appearance that lasts between washes and enhances overall vehicle look

SAFE ON MULTIPLE SURFACES – This Chemical Guys tire shine is formulated for rubber, vinyl, and plastic; ideal for exterior tires, interior trim, engine bay plastics, and other automotive or marine surfaces without causing damage

EASY SPRAY APPLICATION – Spray this high gloss tire shine directly onto surfaces or applicator, spread evenly, and wipe off excess for a streak-free, dry-to-the-touch finish without greasy residue or mess
RESTORES COLOR AND LUSTER – Tire spray shine that revives dull, faded surfaces to enhance overall vehicle appearance while delivering professional-quality detailing results that impress every time

VERSATILE USES – This gloss dressing for detailing is perfect for cars, trucks, motorcycles, RVs, and boats; safe on coated, wrapped, or clear-bra surfaces for added shine and protection on a variety of vehicle types
product_description: Give tires and trim a deep, glossy finish with Tire Kicker Sprayable Extra Glossy Tire Shine (TVD1131602). This sprayable dressing restores a wet, freshly detailed look to rubber, vinyl, and plastic surfaces while adding protection that keeps them looking better for longer. Formulated for ease of use, Tire Kicker revives faded tires, bumpers, and exterior trim in seconds. The high-gloss formula enhances depth and shine while leaving behind a protective layer that helps resist fading, drying, and cracking caused by daily exposure to the elements. Unlike greasy dressings, the spray leaves surfaces dry-to-the-touch with a streak-free finish that won’t sling onto paintwork. Perfect for both exterior and interior applications, this versatile dressing works on tires, weatherstripping, engine bay plastics, and interior vinyl surfaces. Use it to restore rubber seals, refresh trim pieces, or highlight hard-to-reach areas with a clean, glossy appearance. Its balanced formula makes it safe for a wide range of detailing tasks, from routine washes to full restorations. Application is quick and convenient—simply spray directly onto the surface or onto a foam applicator, spread evenly, and wipe off any excess. The result is a uniform, high-gloss finish that instantly elevates the look of any vehicle. With its lightweight spray design, it’s easy to apply on the go or as part of a complete detailing session. Tire Kicker Sprayable Extra Glossy Tire Shine is the go-to choice among car essentials for enthusiasts and professionals who want fast, effective, and reliable results. From daily drivers to show cars, it delivers that just-detailed look with minimal effort. It's great for car owners and auto enthusiasts to use during their routine car detailing and vehicle maintenance.

short_description: EASY TO USE: Simply squeeze a little tire dressing on the IPELY quality applicator and spread the dressing over the entire tire. It spreads a perfect shine every wipe.

REDUCES PRODUCT WASTE: The dense foam can hold the dressings on the applicator and reduce the waste of your expensive product. It will prevent messy drips and runs while applying your dressing.
KEEP YOUR HANDS CLEAN: Place a thick, wave pattern pad between you and the tire. Protects your fingers and nails from grease, grime, and dirt when applying tire shine or trim dressing.

DURABLE, WASHABLE AND REUSABLE: IPELY applicator was created for multiple, repeated uses. The durable high-quality foam material is washable, allowing it to be reused over and over again. Just allow it to dry completely before reuse.

short_description: GEL TIRE SHINE: One 18 fl oz bottle of Armor All Extreme Tire Shine Gel
LONG-LASTING SLEEK BLACK SHINE: Advanced formula delivers long-lasting rich, black shine to car tires
WITH HIGH MOLECULAR-WEIGHT SILICONE: Fortified with high molecular-weight silicone to preserve tires' color and shine
PROTECTS TIRES: Protects against harmful elements that can cause cracking and fading; ideal for vehicle owners, commuters and car enthusiasts
EASY TO APPLY: Apply the tire gel evenly on your vehicle's tires for easy, one step application—no wiping required and no messy overspray
USE ONLY ON SIDEWALLS: Use only on sidewalls, and avoid putting product on treads, brakes or floors; do not use on cycle tires
product_description: Armor All Extreme Tire Shine Gel is an advanced formula, engineered to deliver an extraordinary rich, black shine that lasts for weeks. This tire shine is an incredibly rich, powerful gel that adheres to your tires, forming a resilient, durable shield. Fortified with high molecular-weight silicone, this tire gel preserves your tires’ intense, captivating shine and rich black look. Armor All tire shine also protects your tires from harmful elements that can cause cracking and fading over time, making it an ideal addition to car cleaning products for vehicle owners, commuters and car enthusiasts. Simply apply this tire gel evenly on your vehicle's tires for easy, one step application—no wiping required and no messy overspray to handle. Whether you’re maintaining your daily ride or getting your classic car ready for the next show, this tire gel will give your tires an extreme wet-black shine. In addition to gel tire shine, the Armor All brand also makes car wash, car tire cleaner spray and other car care products. Give your vehicle the finish it deserves with Armor All products.
